import React from'react';import Thumbnail from'./Thumbnail';import Lightbox from'./Lightbox';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ImageGallery=()=>{// Sample images from CDN (Picsum Photos)
